item.title: CVE-2024-47355|2024-10-06T10:19:01.177Z -- cozythemes -- cozy%20blocks
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CozyThemes Cozy Blocks allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Cozy Blocks: from n/a through 2.0.11.
